title: Flyingjack123
author: Flyingjack123
content: For all the newbies out there who are still trying to figure gur, what crypto is all aboutA list of crypto terminologies can be a first lesson.Here I am trying to put the source links of such basic Â terminologies.From bitcoin to altcoin from hodl to rekdSo please learn for yourselfhttps://www.google.com/amp/s/www.nasdaq.com/articles/decoding-crypto%253A-top-25-crypto-terms-you-need-to-know-2021-09-13%3famphttps://genesisblockhk.com/12-terms-all-crypto-lovers-should-know/https://www.google.com/amp/s/time.com/nextadvisor/investing/cryptocurrency/crypto-terms-you-should-know-before-investing/amp/

comments.author: Cynthia_sinach042
comments.body: Hello at @flyingjack123 I don't know how old you are here, but the forum got us covered and the forum has some post on Cryptocurrency terminology here is a good one.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=126798.0

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: The posted links are just lists of relatively popular terms and not really something of imperative value to a newbie in the Bitcoin space. I would even argue that a huge chunk of what's on that list are just there for the purpose of getting picked up noreby search engines and not to educate anyone.The forum has a search option which one can use to check what has been posted before, as many topic ideas have already at one point or the other discussed on the forum.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Terms which one should know are those when one comes across unknown terms, searches, learns then it sticks otherwise it pours away.
